title: [GAMEPLAY] Snowday Gnar doesn't turn white when he's about to transform
body:
When playing as Snowday Gnar, whenever you're about to transform; you should turn white, indicating that your 2nd form is ready. But as you can see [here](http://i.imgur.com/ABHYyN7.jpg), he just stays the same as in his normal form. He SHOULD turn white, like [here](http://imgur.com/j906QZz.jpg). This gives this skin a slight disadvantage, since it makes it a bit harder for your team to know when exactly you're about to transform.

1. Choose Snowday Gnar as the skin.
2. Attack minions/champions until you have 100 Rage Meter.
3. Observe the character.

I've played about 5 games with the skin, and every time I'm about to transform, he looks the same as if he has 0 Rage Meter, and doesn't turn white.

replies.body:
Yo!

I'm the VFX dude that worked on him. Looks like there were some simple name changes made to this guy. Pretty simple fix.
